channel.title: My server development pack NOT A DOWNLOAD I need Suggestions *PIC*
channel.description:
Well i am developing a server development pack, it will be good for new coders.
Here is a screenshot: [img]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/4606/suggestld4.png[/img]
Notice the "tools" pallet, I will need suggestions on what to put in there, E.G. a command use amount variable. etc. I dont work with private servers much, so i need these. Thanks.
[b][u]Things i need right now:[/u][/b] - Command Use variable from the "starter" command. - They invisible body part variables. - The variable to send a message to everyone
[b][u]Lists i need:[/u][/b] - Animations, Along with the variable.
the rest you may suggest on this thread

item.title: My server development pack NOT A DOWNLOAD I need Suggestions *PIC*
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

a variable

like

addItem(ID, AMOUNT);

Read full topic

[quote=“Frell, post:20, topic:122716”][quote author=getsome link=topic=172429.msg1595335#msg1595335 date=1184384928]
You should make something like this for shops.cfg so its easy to add items and u could make an alphabetic list whit all items (most of them) add pics to them so u can sellect them like that and then the ID pops in the box or u can type the ID urself.
[/quote]
i might pack that in there.[/quote]would be very cool then il surrely use then i could make my shops fast and easy.

SOME OTHER SUGESTIONS :

server compile button
server start button
moparscape start button
an item database whit pics and IDS
gfx list button

item.title: My server development pack NOT A DOWNLOAD I need Suggestions *PIC*
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“xxl3th4lxx, post:6, topic:122716”]teleportToX = 2730; // the X coords
teleportToY = 5072; // the Y coords

PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;

    showInterface(Id Here)

PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();

    String name = command.substring(6);

    PlayerHandler.messageToAll("Your Message here");

    updateRequired = true or false
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true or false

like that?[/quote]
yes, thanks. ++ for that. Exactly what i needed.

Read full topic
